options.content:
# Welcome to our ASSUME demo

This is the Grafana Dashboard which makes interacting with the simulation data very easy.

# Market-specific Data

Data specific for the market depending on the choice made at te top of the panel

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  supply_volume
FROM market_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(product_start)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Overview of market results for the chossen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  simulation as "simulation",
  supply_volume AS "Supply Volume"
FROM market_meta
WHERE $__timeFilter(product_start) and
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY simulation, product_start, supply_volume
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  simulation as "simulation",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE $__timeFilter(product_start) and
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Market Summary EOM

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(round(CAST(price AS numeric), 2)) FILTER(where accepted_volume != 0) AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id",
  simulation as "simulation"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit_id not in ('', ' ')
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time, price, simulation
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(product_start,$__interval),
  price as "MCP",
  simulation as "simulation"
FROM market_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(product_start) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
Group by 1, product_start, price, simulation
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Accepted Bid Prices

panels.description: Accepted Volume  per unit in chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(accepted_volume) AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id",
  simulation as "simulation"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time, simulation
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Accepted Bid Volume

targets.rawSql:
SELECT summary.simulation, summary."Total cost",
orders."Social welfare producers",
summary."Total volume"
From (
SELECT
  simulation,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as "Total cost",
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as "Total volume"
FROM kpis
where simulation in ($simulation)
group by simulation
ORDER BY simulation) summary
join (
SELECT
  simulation,
  sum(round(CAST((accepted_price - price) * accepted_volume AS numeric), 2)) filter(where accepted_volume>0) as "Social welfare producers"
FROM market_orders
where simulation in ($simulation)
group by simulation
ORDER BY simulation) orders on orders.simulation = summary.simulation

SELECT
  simulation,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'avg_price') as avg_price,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as total_cost,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2)*1000)  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as total_volume
  
FROM kpis
where variable in ('total_cost', 'total_volume', 'avg_price') and
  simulation in ($simulation)
group by simulation
ORDER BY simulation

SELECT
  simulation,
  (sum(round(CAST(volume as numeric), 2)) filter(where unit_id in ($Demand_Units))
  - sum(round(CAST(accepted_volume as numeric), 2)) filter(where unit_id in ($Demand_Units)))*1000 as loss_of_load,
  sum(round(CAST((accepted_price - price) * accepted_volume AS numeric), 2)) filter(where accepted_volume > 0) as welfare_prod,
  (sum(round(CAST(accepted_volume AS numeric), 2)) filter(where unit_id in ('Wind onshore', 'Wind offshore', 'Solar', 'Hydro', 'Biomass'))
  /
  sum(round(CAST(accepted_volume AS numeric), 2)) filter(where accepted_volume > 0))*100 as ren_share,
  (sum(round(CAST(abs(volume) AS numeric), 2)) filter(where unit_id in ('Wind onshore', 'Wind offshore', 'Solar', 'Hydro', 'Biomass')) 
  -
  sum(round(CAST(abs(accepted_volume) AS numeric), 2)) filter(where unit_id in ('Wind onshore', 'Wind offshore', 'Solar', 'Hydro', 'Biomass')))* 1000 as curtailed_ren
FROM market_orders
where simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY simulation
ORDER BY simulation

SELECT
  simulation,
  stddev(round(CAST(price AS numeric), 2)) as MCP_std
FROM market_meta
where simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY simulation
ORDER BY simulation

panels.description: Shows installed capacities in the simulation based on the fuel type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT On (index)
  NOW() as time_sec,
  SUM(max_power/2),
  technology
FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE "simulation" in ($simulation)
GROUP BY technology, index

panels.title: Installed Generation Capacities

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Timestamp" AS "time",
  volume
FROM demand_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  concat(unit, '_', simulation) as "unit",
  sum(round(CAST(total_cost AS numeric), 2)) as Total_cost,
  sum(round(CAST(energy_cashflow AS numeric), 2)) as Total_revenues,
  sum(round(CAST(profit AS numeric), 2)) as Total_profits,
  sum(round(CAST(abs(power) AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as Total_power
FROM unit_dispatch
where 
  unit in ($Gen_Units) and
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY unit, simulation
ORDER BY unit

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power: {{max_power}} MW
Minimum Power: {{min_power}} MW
Efficiency: {{efficiency}}
##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT On (index) * FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE index in ($Gen_Units) and simulation in ($simulation)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  sum(power) AS "dispatch",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(accepted_volume) AS "accepted_volume",
  unit_id,
  simulation
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, simulation
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
select 
  orders."time",
  sum(round(CAST(orders.price AS numeric), 2)) FILTER(where orders.volume = powerplants.min_power) AS "inflex price",
  sum(round(CAST(orders.price AS numeric), 2)) FILTER(where orders.volume != powerplants.min_power) AS "flex price",
  sum(round(CAST(orders.volume AS numeric), 2)) FILTER(where orders.volume = powerplants.min_power) AS "inflex volume",
  sum(round(CAST(orders.volume AS numeric), 2)) FILTER(where orders.volume != powerplants.min_power) AS "flex volume",
  concat(unit_id, '_', bid_type, '_', simulation) As "id"
from 
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  price,
  sum(round(CAST(volume as numeric), 2)) AS "volume",
  unit_id as "unit_id",
  simulation,
  bid_type
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, bid_type, simulation, unit_id, price
Order by 1) orders
left join (
SELECT
  index,
  min_power
FROM
  power_plant_meta
WHERE
  index in ($Gen_Units)
Group By 1, min_power
order by 1
) powerplants 
on (powerplants.index = orders.unit_id)
Group by "id", orders."time", orders.unit_id
order by 1, orders.unit_id

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(round(CAST(volume as numeric), 2)) AS "sum offered volume",
  max(price) as "max offered price",
  simulation
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, simulation
Order by 1

panels.title: Offered Bid Prices and Volume

panels.description: energy that has to be bought or sold addtionally

targets.rawSql:
Select sum(abs(market_outcome."Accepted Volume" - actual_dispatch.power))*1000 as "mismatch",
  market_outcome."id"
From(
SELECT
  index as "time",
  power,
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  unit in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, power, index, simulation, unit
ORDER BY 1) actual_dispatch
left join(
SELECT
  start_time as "time",
  sum(accepted_volume) as "Accepted Volume",
  simulation,
  unit_id,
  concat(unit_id, '_', simulation) as "id"
FROM market_orders
Where
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, simulation, start_time
ORDER BY 1
) market_outcome on (market_outcome.time = actual_dispatch.time AND
  actual_dispatch.unit = market_outcome.unit_id AND
  actual_dispatch.simulation = market_outcome.simulation
)
GROUP BY market_outcome.id
ORDER BY market_outcome.id

panels.title: Unitwise breaking constraints - Sum

panels.description: actual dispatch respecting ramping unit constraints - Market outcome

targets.rawSql:
Select (actual_dispatch.power - market_outcome."Accepted Volume")  as "mismatch",
  market_outcome.unit_id,
  actual_dispatch."time",
  market_outcome.simulation
From(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power,
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation, index
ORDER BY 1) actual_dispatch
left join(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(accepted_volume) as "Accepted Volume",
  simulation,
  unit_id
FROM market_orders
Where
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, simulation, start_time
ORDER BY 1
) market_outcome on (market_outcome.time = actual_dispatch.time AND
  actual_dispatch.unit = market_outcome.unit_id AND
  actual_dispatch.simulation = market_outcome.simulation)

panels.title: Unitwise breaking constraints - dispatched power minus accepted

panels.description: Offered volume is incorrect, because only accepted and partly accepted orders are saved

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  orders."id",
  orders."offered_volume",
  orders."accepted_volume",
  units."dispatched_volume"
from(
SELECT
  sum(round(CAST(volume AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as "offered_volume",
  sum(round(CAST(accepted_volume AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as "accepted_volume",
  simulation,
  unit_id,
  concat(unit_id, '_', simulation) as "id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit_id IN ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY unit_id, simulation) orders
join
(
SELECT
  sum(round(CAST(power AS numeric)*1000, 2)) AS "dispatched_volume",
  simulation,
  unit,
  concat(unit, '_', simulation) as "id"
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit IN ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY unit, simulation
) units on orders."id" = units."id"
order by units.unit

panels.title: Accepted volumes

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  orders."id",
  orders."offered_volume",
  orders."accepted_volume",
  units."dispatched_volume",
  orders.unit_id
from(
SELECT
  -sum(round(CAST(volume AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as "offered_volume",
  -sum(round(CAST(accepted_volume AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as "accepted_volume",
  simulation,
  unit_id,
  concat(unit_id, '_', simulation) as "id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit_id IN ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY unit_id, simulation) orders
join
(
SELECT
  -sum(round(CAST(power AS numeric)*1000, 2)) AS "dispatched_volume",
  simulation,
  unit,
  concat(unit, '_', simulation) as "id"
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit IN ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY unit, simulation
) units on orders."id" = units."id"

SELECT
  orders."id",
  orders."offered_volume" as "offered_volume",
  orders."accepted_volume",
  units."dispatched_volume",
  orders.unit_id
from(
SELECT
  -sum(round(CAST(volume AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as "offered_volume",
  -sum(round(CAST(accepted_volume AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as "accepted_volume",
  simulation,
  unit_id,
  concat(unit_id, '_', simulation) as "id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit_id IN ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY unit_id, simulation) orders
join
(
SELECT
  -sum(round(CAST(power AS numeric)*1000, 2)) AS "dispatched_volume",
  simulation,
  unit,
  concat(unit, '_', simulation) as "id"
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit IN ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY unit, simulation
) units on orders."id" = units."id"
order by units.unit, units.simulation

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Timestamp" AS "time",
  volume
FROM demand_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  accepted_volume AS "power",
  unit_id,
  simulation
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, accepted_volume, simulation
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power: {{max_power}} MW
Minimum Power: {{min_power}} MW
Efficiency: {{efficiency}}
##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT distinct on (index) * FROM demand_meta
WHERE index in ($Demand_Units) and simulation in ($simulation)

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen storage unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Timestamp" AS "time",
  volume
FROM demand_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  concat(unit, '_', simulation) as "unit",
  sum(round(CAST(total_cost AS numeric), 2)) as Total_cost,
  sum(round(CAST(energy_cashflow AS numeric), 2)) as Total_revenues,
  sum(round(CAST(profit AS numeric), 2)) as Total_profits,
  sum(round(CAST(abs(power) AS numeric)*1000, 2)) as Total_power
FROM unit_dispatch
where 
  unit in ($Storage_Units) and
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY unit, simulation
ORDER BY unit

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power Disharge: {{max_power_discharge}} MW
Minimum Power Discharge: {{min_power_discharge}} MW
Efficiency Discharge: {{efficiency_discharge}}
Maximum Power Charge: {{max_power_charge}} MW
Minimum Power Charge: {{min_power_charge}} MW
Efficiency Charge: {{efficiency_charge}}
##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT distinct on (index) * FROM storage_meta
WHERE index in ($Storage_Units) and simulation in ($simulation)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  accepted_volume AS "Market dispatch",
  unit_id,
  simulation
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, accepted_volume, simulation
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "Actual dispatch",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation in ($simulation) AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  accepted_price AS "Accepted price:",
  price AS "Bid price:",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id",
  simulation
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id, price, accepted_price, simulation
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Bid Prices

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_volume) AS "Accepted volume:",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id",
  simulation
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id, simulation
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(volume) AS "Bid volume:",
  unit_id,
  simulation
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, simulation
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  soc as "State of Charge",
  unit,
  simulation
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units) AND
  simulation in ($simulation)
GROUP By soc, unit, simulation, index
ORDER BY 1
